Pioneers in Fintech +12 years of operations in the Middle East Platforms used by millions of users with millions of daily transactions Platform built on micro-services Leaders in Fintech and self-care products in the region Strategic Partnerships Strategic partnership with Zain Group Strategic partnership with Visa and Mastercard Strategic alliances with ICT industry leaders & memberships in leading industry think tanks Regional Expertise Proficient regional experience in the GCC serving +30 banks Providing our clients the latest & most innovative Fintech products Representative offices in Kuwait, Beirut, Dubai, Riyadh (in progress) +12 years of operations in the Middle East Platforms used by millions of users with millions of daily transactions Platform built on micro-services Leaders in Fintech and self-care products in the region Strategic partnership with Zain Group Strategic partnership with Visa and Mastercard Strategic alliances with ICT industry leaders & memberships in leading industry think tanks Proficient regional experience in the GCC serving +30 banks Providing our clients the latest & most innovative Fintech products Representative offices in Kuwait, Beirut, Dubai, Riyadh (in progress) What We Do Fintech Product Provider A modular fintech platform consists of a set of innovative products covering white label digital wallet, card issuance, merchant platform, payment solutions, digital onboarding, digital bank, provided as SaaS or on premise. Digital Solution Provider Helping our clients deliver customized digital solution through in house development, professional services and integration with third party solutions and systems. Fintech Service Provider Providing CaaS and FaaS in partnership with banks and processors in the region. Fintech Consultancy Advisor Delivering expert digital security consultancy to protect your business, guiding you with business model consultancy for sustainable growth, and offering technical consultancy to optimize your technology infrastructure. UI/UX Creating brand new UI/UX designs to enhance user experiences, offering UI/UX consultancy/audit to refine your existing interfaces, and driving digital transformation to elevate your business. Why We Do It Customer Pain Points Fragmented ecosystem Services provided to businesses are fragmentated across multiple providers System integration complexities Legacy systems and no centralized processes Fast deployment and market reach Implementation of new launch took 18 to 24 months Frictionless customer journey Manual verification and documentation processes prolonged customer on-boarding Value Proposition Faster Time To Market Leverage FOO's local and global integrations enabling used cases to be implemented using FOO out of the box products and/or customization.
